Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to illegal conversions of manufacturing or industrial space to residential use.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing fines for illegal conversions from industrial to residential uses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspection cycles for exterior walls.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that critical examinations of building facades for buildings greater than six stories in height take place on a five-year cycle starting from the year in which the building was erected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to illegal conversions of manufacturing or industrial space to residential use.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Increasing fines for illegal conversions from industrial to residential uses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Regulating the use of electronic access systems for certain multiple dwellings and the dissemination and retention of information obtained by such systems.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspection cycles for exterior walls.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring that critical examinations of building facades for buildings greater than six stories in height take place on a five-year cycle starting from the year in which the building was erected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspection cycles for exterior walls.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that critical examinations of building facades for buildings greater than six stories in height take place on a five-year cycle starting from the year in which the building was erected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to inspection cycles for exterior walls.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Requiring that critical examinations of building facades for buildings greater than six stories in height take place on a five-year cycle starting from the year in which the building was erected.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to illegal conversions of manufacturing or industrial space to residential use.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amended by Committee
Items.MatterName: Increasing fines for illegal conversions from industrial to residential uses.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to illegal conversions of manufacturing or industrial space to residential use.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Increasing fines for illegal conversions from industrial to residential uses.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Garodnick, Reyna and Oddo
